Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • DB
  • public class DB
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DB. Encapsulates database MariaDB connection.

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        java.sql.SQLException,
                        java.net.URISyntaxException
        Inits the connection. Here it tries to run database script to create tables if not exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
        java.net.URISyntaxException - the URI syntax exception

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser​(User user)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes user. Note, first it needs to delete salt (foreign key constraint) from 'salt' table, and only after that delete user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
